…Pit River Tribe.

After decades of conflict and loss, the Pit River Tribe was federally  recognized in 1976. The Pit River Tribe consists of 11 different  California Tribal bands and resides on a 100-square-mile reservation.  In the late 1960s and early 1970s, the Tribe aimed to regain control of  the Four Corners property near Burney, California.…
